This method starts the game in Challenger mode.

This method executes the game with the Challenger mode.

playDefender() - Method in class games.Game
This method starts the game in Defender mode

This method is redefined in the different daughter's classes.

This method executes the game with the defender mode.

playDuel() - Method in class games.Game
This method starts the game in Duel mode

This method is redefined in the different daughter's classes.
playDuel() - Method in class games.Mastermind
 
playDuel() - Method in class games.MoreLess
This method executes the game in duel mode

In this mode, the player and computer must discover a randomly generated mystery number.
Player - Class in games
This class represents a player

Player's class constructor

The name and display are initialized from the parameters provided to the constructor
playerName - Variable in class games.Player

players - Variable in class games.Game
Players list

Players are stored in ArrayList of player.
poolMastermind - Variable in class games.ComputerPlayer

print(String) - Method in class display.Display
Allow to display a String without terminate the line.

Allow to display a ArrayList of Integer without terminate the line.
